comments.body:
i still think something is missing.
i would like to suggest two more tests (hope i'm not repeating myself).
how about a test that increases the width and decreases the height and vice versa?
all 4 corners will not be found in both of these tests, but i still think it has value 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7045099/106882016-ed9e0700-66e6-11eb-8de6-628538d36deb.png)
it creates a case where the point is outside the vertical space and inside the horizontal space, so it may still be able to smoke out some bugs.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +604,608 @@            }

            # make the box smaller by two meter in each direction to put the coordinate slightly outside the box.
            set height_new [expr {$height_m-4}]
            set width_new [expr {$width_m-4}]

comments.body: These two are good, but please also add a test for `GEOADD XX`, another one for `GEOADD NX` and one for asserting an error for `GEOADD NX XX`
I'd change that to test just one illegal option, eg `GEOADD nyc foo -73.9454966 40.747533 "lic market"`
